actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the treatment of malt houses for purposes of the investment tax credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify malthouses for investment tax credit treatment. Defines the term "malthouse" as any structure or enclosure used for housing equipment (including steeping tanks, germination chambers, and kilns) necessary for the commercial production of malt.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the treatment of malt houses for purposes of the investment tax credit.
